name: NCCN International Prognostic Index (IPI)
title: NCCN International Prognostic Index (IPI)
notes: **Note:** Physician statement of NCCN IPI must be used to code this data item. Do not calculate points or assign risk. Only record points or risk if a physician has documented them. Use points over risk if both are available.
rows: Stated as low intermediate risk (2-3 points)
